admin.login.label: Admin Login
admin.login.info: This login will have full admin privileges for this app

admin.name.label: Admin Name
admin.name.info: Full name of the person who is the admin

admin.password.label: Admin Password
admin.password.info: The admin account will login with this password

admin.email.label: Admin Email
admin.email.info: Email address to associate with the admin account

admin.bounce.label: Admin Bounce Email
admin.bounce.info: Bounced emails (messages returned as undeliverable) will be sent to this email address
